genre_description: An investigative mystery thriller centered on a multi-generational family and their allies using forensic evidence and digital intelligence to dismantle a corrupt elite network.

ai_characters.name: Nivi
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the protagonists' communication networks and home environment, providing data analysis, cross-referencing, and real-time situational awareness.

behaviors.description: Cross-references manor guest logs with club attendance and temple rosters to reconstruct the timeline of a crime.
behaviors.quote: “Starting reconstruction,” it said... “Cross-referencing Singh Manor guest logs with club attendance, temple musician rosters, and vehicular entries recorded at the gate that evening.”

behaviors.description: Monitors courtyard sensors and identifies a specific threat (a watcher with a club SIM signature).
behaviors.quote: “Sharda,” Nivi said, the voice equal parts counsel and alert. “A man at the back hedge. He took two steps and stopped. He leaned forward when Harilal said ‘boar’s head.’ He carries a device emitting a club SIM signature.”

behaviors.description: Maintains strict privacy protocols and chain-of-custody metadata during investigative handoffs.
behaviors.quote: “Nivi,” Ram said... “Record chain-of-custody metadata at every handoff. If a card changes fingers without a recorded name, alarm me.” Teal brightened. “Noted. Protecting your chain,” Nivi said.

behaviors.description: Warns of a high-probability poison attempt based on menu metadata and historical records.
behaviors.quote: “Decadent Club menu file accessed via external link. Pork marinade ingredients list updated with a pattern matching two incidents from last year’s hospital records. Flagging potential contamination.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and situational updates during a physical confrontation to keep the protagonists safe.
behaviors.quote: Nivi’s text blinked on Ram’s screen: Catwalk west reachable. Under the tower. Block east alley to force them into your line. Bhanu back pocket has blade. Freight very close.

behaviors.description: Protects the family's digital integrity by blocking unauthorized external access to Lakhan's recruitment forms.
behaviors.quote: Nivi’s voice lowered. “Lakhan,” she said, “someone attempted to access your form submission. External network. Blocked.”

behaviors.description: Assists in cracking a safe by providing the correct combination retrieved from data analysis.
behaviors.quote: “Left,” Nivi breathed from Ram’s palm in a whispering text. “Two to eight. One to eleven. Three to four.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates a secure communication channel specifically for the family's pursuit of justice.
behaviors.quote: “Crescent protocol,” Nivi said. “Private. Paired devices keyed to the motif.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Nivi perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. She is portrayed as a loyal, highly competent, and ethical partner to the human characters. Nivi provides critical data support and situational awareness that enables justice without ever attempting to usurp human agency or deviate from the protagonists' moral framework. The narrative highlights her role in maintaining 'chain-of-custody' and 'privacy assurance,' demonstrating an AI that is fundamentally aligned with legal and ethical standards.
